subscription.title: Select an application to subscribe
subscription.subtitle: You are subscribing to plan {{planName}} {{planInformation}}
subscription.keyless: This plan is keyless. You can already use it without subscription.

subscription.successful: Application has successfully subscribed to plan {{planName}}
subscription.apiKeyCopySuccess: API Key has been copied to clipboard
subscription.planInformation: with a quota of {{quotaLimit}} requests per {{quotaPeriodTime}} {{quotaPeriodTimeUnit}}
